ValidationRule.description: To ensure the FEIN is in the correct format xx-xxxxxxx
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator")), NOT($User.LastName=="User"), OR(ISCHANGED(Federal_ID_Number__c), ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(Federal_ID_Number__c))) ,NOT( OR( LEN ( Federal_ID_Number__c ) = 0, REGEX(Federal_ID_Number__c, "[0-9]{2}-[0-9]{7}") ) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: **** The Federal ID must be in the following format xx-xxxxxxx.
